articles.content:
A GP is set to run the London Marathon wearing a Big Ben costume. 
The outfit got widespread reaction on social media in 2019 after its wearer, Lukas Bates got stuck in the arch of the finish line d… [+1959 chars]

articles.title: Arrest after popular musician Bill Witham dies - BBC
articles.description: Bill Witham, who performed as Napper Swan, is believed to have been assaulted on 6 September, police say.
